content: note this is a personal pattern non-commercial use only march 14 2012 - pattern has been updated to clarify my short hand and give more details this is a small carriage blanket made for a newborn uses less than half of the pound of love instructions are given on how to make it wider/longer in case you d like to do that **please note that you need to use worsted weight yarn** or higher in order to get the width i got if you use lower weight yarn you will need to make it wider please see pattern to help you with this swatching is your friend it will help you figure out how big yours will be and how many repeats you will need
